About.title: About me
About.description: Hi, I'm Szymon. As a Front-End developer, I turn projects into modern and efficient websites. This site is a showcase of my capabilities - I demonstrate what a well-done project should look like on the web. I have over a year of commercial experience, but I've been coding much longer than that. What sets me apart? Realism and partnership approach. I know what kind of product I can deliver and always focus on quality and transparent communication. Do you need a solid website for your business? I invite you to contact me.

AboutSubPage.title: About me
AboutSubPage.intro: Hi, I'm Szymon – a front-end developer with a passion for code, aesthetics, and... physical fitness.
AboutSubPage.daily: Every day, I design and build modern websites – ones that not only look good but also run fast, intuitively, and without compromise. I love combining logic with creativity – it's that mix that got me hooked on web development.
AboutSubPage.lifestyle: But my life isn’t just digital. I’ve been a volunteer firefighter for years – a role that taught me responsibility, pressure management, and teamwork. On top of that, I train regularly – the gym is like a second home to me, and I go there up to 5 times a week. I care about my body because physical fitness isn’t just about looks – it’s about energy, discipline, and health, all of which influence how I work.
AboutSubPage.hobbies: After hours, I enjoy editing videos – sometimes for myself, sometimes for friends with a vision. It’s my creative break from code and a great exercise in attention to detail.
AboutSubPage.approach: In work, I focus on quality, a realistic approach, and a true partnership. I don’t make empty promises – instead, I deliver solid solutions, clear communication, and full engagement from start to finish.
AboutSubPage.closing: If you're looking for someone who not only knows front-end but also has clear priorities and knows how to get things done – feel free to reach out.
